name: Supercritical: A Post-Apocalyptic Bonsai
description:
Original submission to Godot Wild Jam #49
Trim the nuclear bonsai before it goes boom!

Controls:

Arrow keys for Movement
Space to Clip Vines
Shift to Run
Z to Wait
P to Pause / Open Menu

Credits:

Programming: Maaack
Pixel Art: mikoolec
Music and SFX: Mike
Special thanks to everyone who contributed their feedback!

Source:

Github
